This is a good note-taking app I use for school. It's very well organized, simple and easy to use. But I would prefer having more control over some specific features such as the colour of the grid lines and colour of pens/highlighters. I wish there was a setting I could choose for the app not to open on 'Recent Pages' because I prefer to choose the notebook and page I want to open myself. But overall it's a great app for typed or handwritten notes.
